section.section: There is a Governor's Wellmobile Program Advisory Board.
The purpose of the Advisory Board is to assist the University of Maryland School of Nursing in overseeing and raising funds for the Program.

text.section: Except for the ex officio and legislative members, the members of the Advisory Board shall be appointed by the Governor with the advice and consent of the Senate.
The Dean of the University of Maryland School of Nursing shall serve as the chairman of the Advisory Board.

section.section: Except for the ex officio and legislative members, the term of a member is 3 years.
Except for the ex officio and legislative members, the terms of members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Board on October 1, 2000.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed.

text.section: The Board shall meet at least four times each year, at the times and places that it determines.
